categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Baramak was a Human male Colonel of the resurgent Sith Empire living during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY, he was stationed on the Imperial waystation of the planet Ilum as part of the Empire's operation to acquire the adegan crystals. However, he learned that the Republic planned on using their mining equipment to collapse a valuable set of tunnels, preventing the Empire from mining the crystals for months. Baramak decided to foil this plan by sending an Imperial-allied individual to destroy the Republic's mining equipment.
Major Dermian first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
It is only accessible to Imperial players in the game on Ilum.
